metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18064 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: cairo through 1.15.14 has an out-of-bounds stack-memory write during processing of a crafted document by WebKitGTK+ because of the interaction between cairo-rectangular-scan-converter.c (the generate and render_rows functions) and cairo-image-compositor.c (the _cairo_image_spans_and_zero function).

notes.Note: leosilva> as of 2020-11-26, no upstream fix

criterions.comment: cairo package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
